DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test new imaging agent call 89Zr-J591 ( stand humanize antibody call J591 , attach radioactive material call Zirconium-89 ) patient glioblastoma multiforme .
DOC.brief_title: 89Zr-J591 Anti-Prostate-Specific Membrane Antigen Monoclonal Antibody Patients With Glioblastoma Multiforme
DOC.criteria: Patient age > 25 year old < 80 year old Patients reoccurrence brain tumor The principal investigator coPI must review MRI CT finding base radiologic assessment provide meet follow image criterion ( establish clinical trial 09177 ) : OR Patients newly diagnose GBM one follow option : Eligible surgery last research scan . AST ( SGOT ) > 2.5x ULN . Bilirubin ( total ) > 1.5x ULN . Serum calcium > 11 mg/dL . Pregnant breastfeeding ( female childbearing potential , unsure pregnancy status , standard pregnancy test do ) .
